TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientScriptItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示设计时 Web 窗体或用户控件中的客户端脚本元素。

span.span: Represents a client script element in a Web Form or user control at design time.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示`script`在设计时包含 Web 文档中的元素。The class represents a `script` element that is contained in a Web document at design time. 可以使用自定义控件的设计器实现对象将客户端脚本元素添加到 Web 窗体或用户控件。A custom control designer implementation can use a object to add client script elements to a Web Form or user control. 在设计时，使用类来设置或检查包含在文档中，如 Web 窗体、 Web 服务器控件、 内容页中或母版页，设计图面上的客户端脚本元素。At design time, use the class to set or examine client script elements that are contained in a document, such as a Web form, a Web server control, a content page, or a master page, on the design surface. 检索客户端通过使用包含在 Web 文档的脚本元素的集合方法。Retrieve the collection of client script elements that are contained within the Web document by using the method. 通过将客户端脚本元素添加到的 Web 文档方法。Add a client script element to the Web document by using the method. 通常情况下，`script`元素包含脚本语句或指定脚本语句的外部位置。Typically, a `script` element either contains script statements or specifies an external location for script statements. `script`元素可以选择性地定义脚本语句的语言。The `script` element can optionally define the language of the script statements. 使用构造函数初始化新的脚本对象的属性。Use the constructor to initialize the properties for a new script object. 使用属性，以检查`script`对象属性和内容。Use the properties to examine the `script` object attributes and contents. 属性表示`language`属性`script`元素。The property represents the `language` attribute of the `script` element. 属性表示`src`属性。The property represents the `src` attribute. 属性表示脚本语句中包含的客户端上执行`script`元素。The property represents the script statements to be executed on the client that are contained in the `script` element. 使用类来管理在设计时要执行的脚本。Use the class to manage scripts that are to be executed at design-time. 若要在运行时管理客户端脚本元素，使用类。To manage client script elements at run time, use the class. 有关在运行时使用客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information about using client scripts at run time, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). > [!NOTE] > 类表示`script`最终分析和客户端浏览器中运行的设计时处的元素。The class represents `script` elements at design time that are ultimately parsed and run in the client browser. 因为`script`为生成的元素对象不会在服务器上运行，所以不包含元素`runat="server"`属性。Because the `script` elements that are generated for the objects are not run on the server, the elements do not contain the `runat="server"` attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public ClientScriptItem (string text, string source, string language, string type, string id);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string text, string source, string language, string type, string id) cil managed
Public Sub New (text As String, source As String, language As String, type As String, id As String)
public: ClientScriptItem(System::String ^ text, System::String ^ source, System::String ^ language, System::String ^ type, System::String ^ id);

param.name: text
param.span: 元素的内容；要在客户端上运行的脚本语句的字符串。

span.span: The contents for the element; a string of script statements to run on the client.

param.name: source
param.span: 元素的 特性值，该值指定客户端脚本内容的外部源位置。

span.span: The attribute value for the element, specifying an external source location for the client script contents.

param.name: language
param.span: 元素的 特性值，该值指定脚本语句的语言。

span.span: The attribute value for the element, specifying the language of the script statements.

param.name: type
param.span: 元素的类型特性值，它表明关联的脚本撰写引擎的 MIME 类型。

span.span: The type attribute value for the element, indicating the MIME type for the associated scripting engine.

param.name: id

span.span: The ID for the element.

param.span: 此参数是设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]）所必需的。

span.span: This argument is required by the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]).

summary.span: 使用提供的参数初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化的语句通过使用对象`text`或`source`参数 （不是两者）。Initialize the statements for the object by using either the `text` or `source` parameter (not both). 使用`text`初始化脚本中使用的输入的字符串，包含的语句。Use `text` to initialize the script using an input string that contains the statements. 或者，使用`source`来初始化脚本使用包含的脚本语句的路径。Alternately, use `source` to initialize a script using a path that contains the script statements. 你可以指定任何输入参数作为`null`或空字符串 ("");使用输入的值，设置对应的属性和`script`没有该属性不会生成元素。You can specify any of the input parameters as `null` or an empty string (""); the corresponding property is set using the input value, and the `script` element is generated without that property. 使用`null`或空字符串 ("") 将生成以下结果：Using `null` or an empty string ("") generates the following results: - 有关`text`，相应`script`元素不包含脚本语句。For `text`, the corresponding `script` element does not contain script statements. - 有关`source`、`src`未设置属性`script`元素。For `source`, the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element. - 有关`language`、`language`未设置属性`script`元素。For `language`, the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 当客户端脚本块不指定的脚本语言时，客户端浏览器将确定的语言。When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language. - 有关`type`、`type`脚本元素中未设置属性。For `type`, the `type` attribute is not set in the script element. 当客户端脚本块未指定脚本类型时，客户端浏览器将确定的类型。When a client script block does not specify the script type, the client browser determines the type. - 有关`id`，设计宿主 (例如， [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 将引发。For `id`, the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) will throw an .

span.span: is null (thrown by the design host).

public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端脚本元素的 特性值。

span.span: Gets the attribute value for the client script element.
The value of the element.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Language { get; }
.property instance string Language
Public ReadOnly Property Language As String
public: property System::String ^ Language { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端脚本元素的 特性值。

span.span: Gets the attribute value for the client script element.

value.span: 为 元素中的 特性指定的语言名称。

span.span: The language name specified for the attribute in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示编写脚本语句所用的语言。The property represents the language in which the script statements are written. 如果属性是`null`或空字符串 ("")，则`language`未设置属性`script`元素。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 当客户端脚本块不指定的脚本语言时，客户端浏览器将确定的语言。When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language. 属性由初始化构造函数。The property is initialized by the constructor.

.property instance string Source
Public ReadOnly Property Source As String
public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端脚本元素的 特性值。

span.span: Gets the attribute value for the client script element.

value.span: 为 元素中的 特性指定的源文件的路径。

span.span: The path to the source file specified for the attribute in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定客户端脚本内容的外部源位置。The property specifies an external source location for the client script contents. 通常情况下，用于的脚本语句`script`元素指定使用或属性。Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the or property. 如果属性是`null`或空字符串 ("")，则`src`未设置属性`script`元素。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 属性由初始化。The property is initialized by the .

public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含在客户端脚本元素中的脚本语句。

span.span: Gets the script statements contained in the client script element.

value.span: 包含在 元素中的脚本语句。

span.span: The script statements contained in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示中包含的语句`script`元素。The property represents the statements that are contained in the `script` element. 通常情况下，用于的脚本语句`script`元素指定使用或属性。Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the or property. 如果属性是`null`或空字符串 ("")，则`script`元素不包含任何脚本语句。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `script` element does not contain any script statements. 属性由初始化构造函数。The property is initialized by the constructor.

summary.span: 获取客户端脚本元素的 特性值。

span.span: Gets the attribute value for the client script element.

value.span: 与 元素关联的 MIME 类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the MIME type associated with the element.
